General.Name: Founders Metals Inc.
General.Description: Founders Metals Inc., a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties in Canada. It holds interests in the Elmtree gold project that includes 49 mineral claims covering an area of 1,063,326 hectares located in New Brunswick; and the Antino gold project covering an area of 23,800 hectares located in southeastern Suriname. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
